mapper.sql: Id, lockIndex, OrderNo, imeiNum, startimgs, lockimgs, doneimgs, CreateTime,picIndex
mapper.insert: insert into t_order_lock_info (Id, lockIndex, OrderNo, imeiNum, startimgs, lockimgs, doneimgs, CreateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lockIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imeiNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lockimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doneimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

Id,
lockIndex,

mapper.update:
update t_order_lock_info
lockIndex = #{lockIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OrderNo = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imeiNum = #{imeiNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startimgs = #{startimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lockimgs = #{lockimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doneimgs = #{doneimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_order_lock_info set lockIndex = #{lockIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrderNo = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imeiNum = #{imeiNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startimgs = #{startimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lockimgs = #{lockimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doneimgs = #{doneimgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_order_lock_info c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.lockIndex like concat ('%', #{lockIndex},'%')
and c.OrderNo like concat ('%', #{orderNo},'%')
order by c.lockIndex asc

select
from t_order_lock_info c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.lockIndex like concat ('%', #{lockIndex},'%')
and c.OrderNo like concat ('%', #{orderNo},'%')
